long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Clisha Chrome Extension is an Extension that allows the user to collect Points for interacting with Webpages. To collect these points the user needs to fullfill certain tasks on a website e.g. watching a video
or answering content related questions to the website. The Clisha Chrome Extension guides the user through a webpage and presents the tasks the user needs to complete on a specific website. The Extension is an addon to the
Clisha Platform where the user can see available websites and his collected points.
